description: Extracts fields out of a JSON message body using JSON Paths. Each path will be selected from the JSON and stored under the corresponding property name in the message.

properties.name: names
properties.label: Names
properties.description: Provide the names of the properties which must correspond to the paths in the 'Paths'.

properties.name: paths
properties.label: Paths
properties.description: Provide the JSON Path which must correspond to the names in the 'Names'. A JSON Path always starts with a '$.'.
